From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To warn users of an impending forced timeout, use the **logout-warning** command in line configuration mode. To restore the default, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Number of seconds that are counted down before session termination. If no number is specified, the default of 20 seconds is used.

Examples: In the following example, a logout warning is configured on line 5 with a countdown value of 30 <seconds>:
ExtraInfo: This command notifies the user of an impending forced timeout (set using the **absolute-timeout** command).

RelatedCmds.description: Sets the interval for closing user connections on a specific line or port.
Sets the interval for closing the connection when there is no input or output traffic.
